Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24806 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.28.2-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24806 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.28.2-6. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.28.2-6, affected by CVE-2024-24806
